content: this is a written pattern only the red forest throw is a very easy pattern it crochet s up very quickly the throw can be made larger by repeating the patterns which are in blocks and by adding more row of the individual patterns any yarn can be used for this pattern as long as the corresponding hooks are also used this throw looks beautiful in any variety of colors i chose the 3 colors i did as i wanted a christmas look more colors can be added to really make it your own
